title: Warszawa 1935 (2013)
overview: "Warszawa 1935" ("Warsaw 1935") is a short movie which was produced by the Newborn special effects studio for nearly 4 years, showing the audience for the very first time the capital of Poland in the mid-war period.  This film will take us to the streets of the city, presenting the precisely reconstructed pre-war Warsaw architecture. The main source of images for the digital reconstruction was photographs available among others in the State Archive of the Capital City of Warsaw. (source: promotional materials)
storyline: This animation takes us back to the 1930s Warsaw, with its busy streets, shops and architecture, which was almost completely destroyed in World War II.
